name: Rutabaga Desert Storm
description:
Lead the Invasion of the Middle Yeast as Rutabaga III and His Trusted Ally, Habanero Jr.

After Rutabaga III's publication of his Cruciferous Manifesto, he has put his fellow vegetable freedom fighters on the front lines. All part of his genius plan, pushing the human forces forward, and allowing for him and Habanero Jr. to sneak into the Middle Yeast and finally destroy the Flying Oppression Cube... once and for all.

Features:

  • Classic side-scrolling action
  • Parallax backgrounds and multiple areas
  • Singleplayer and Local Co-op (Multi-player requires multiple devices)
  • Highscore system to compete with friends
  • Tight flight controls and mashable fire button
  • Power-ups

  • 4 different enemies, with rayshield variants

  • Boss enemy, the Flying Oppression Cube
